long_description: The Transpack Jet ski/snowboard hard case lets you securely ship or transport one or two snowboards or pairs of skis along with gear in a tough and adjustable-length shell. Polyethylene shell adjusts in length to accommodate one or two snowboards or pairs of skis. Locking design works with 5/8 in. hitch pin and TSA locks simultaneously. Internal closed-cell foam padding, side straps and elastic ski-brake retainers provide cushioned stability. The Transpack Jet ski/snowboard hard case features rubber grab handles, easy-pull O-ring and low-profile wheels for effortless hauling.
short_description: The Transpack Jet ski/snowboard hard case lets you securely ship or transport one or two snowboards or pairs of skis along with gear in a tough and adjustable-length shell.
